references.paper_title: Efficient mirror descent ascent methods for nonsmooth minimax problems
references.reason: This paper introduces efficient mirror descent ascent methods which is a foundational method used in the proposed D-AdaST algorithm.

references.paper_title: TiAda: A Time-Scale Adaptive Algorithm for Nonconvex Minimax Optimization
references.reason: TiAda algorithm is the algorithm used in D-AdaST which provides the theoretical foundation for the time-scale separation in D-AdaST.

references.paper_title: On convergence of gradient descent ascent: A tight local analysis
references.reason: This paper provides a tight local analysis of gradient descent ascent which is a foundational result for the understanding of convergence of D-AdaST.

references.paper_title: On Gradient Descent Ascent for Nonconvex-Concave Minimax Problems
references.reason: This paper establishes the convergence of gradient descent ascent for nonconvex-concave minimax problems which is the foundation of the convergence analysis in the current work.

references.paper_title: Local stochastic gradient descent ascent: Convergence analysis and communication efficiency
references.reason: This paper provides an analysis of Local SGDA algorithm and its communication efficiency which is a relevant method to D-AdaST.
